mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${platSchema}.fui_dict_entry ( id, dictid, dictname, dictsort ) VALUES (#{id}, #{dictid}, #{dictname}, #{dictsort})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ${platSchema}.fui_dict_entry WHERE id = #{id} AND dictid = #{dictid}
mapper.update: UPDATE ${platSchema}.fui_dict_entry SET id = #{id}, dictid = #{dictid}, dictname = #{dictname}, dictsort = #{dictsort} WHERE id = #{id} AND dictid = #{dictid}
